refnamediv.refpurpose: support for cascading style properties for canvas items.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GooCanvasStyle provides support for cascading style properties for canvas items. It is intended to be used when implementing new canvas items.
Style properties are identified by a unique GQuark, and contain arbitrary data stored in a GValue.

GooCanvasStyle also provides a few convenience functions such as goo_canvas_style_set_stroke_options() and goo_canvas_style_set_fill_options() which efficiently apply an item's standard style properties to the given cairo_t.

refsect2.title: GooCanvasStyle
refsect2.para: GooCanvasStyle holds the style properties of a canvas item, as well as a pointer to the parent style.

listitem.simpara: an array of GooCanvasStyleProperty property settings.

refsect2.title: GooCanvasStyleProperty
refsect2.para: GooCanvasStyleProperty represents a property setting.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_style_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GooCanvasStyle.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_style_copy ()
refsect2.para: Copies the given GooCanvasStyle, by copying all of its properties. Though the parent of the new style is left unset.

listitem.simpara: a copy of the given GooCanvasStyle.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_style_get_parent ()
refsect2.para: Gets the parent of the style.

listitem.simpara: the parent of the given style, or NULL.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_style_set_parent ()
refsect2.para: Sets the parent of the style.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_style_get_property ()
refsect2.para: Gets the value of a property.
This searches though all the GooCanvasStyle's own list of property settings and also all ancestor GooCanvasStyle objects.
Note that it returns a pointer to the internal GValue setting, which should not be changed.

listitem.simpara: the property value, or NULL if it isn't set.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_style_set_property ()
refsect2.para: Sets a property in the style, replacing any current setting.
Note that this will override the property setting in ancestor GooCanvasStyle objects.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_style_set_fill_options ()
refsect2.para: Sets the standard cairo fill options using the given style.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if a paint source is set, or FALSE if the fill should be skipped.

refsect2.title: goo_canvas_style_set_stroke_options ()
refsect2.para: Sets the standard cairo stroke options using the given style.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if a paint source is set, or FALSE if the stroke should be skipped.
